caption: Atop the city walls, a king watched the besieging army below. He appeared apprehensive and after giving some orders to those around him, he fled. His actions incensed those left behind, causing the morale of the army to waver. Inside a room in the castle, the queen surprisingly vented her frustrations on a servant. A general expressed his grievances regarding the matter, but the queen, in a fit of rage, struck the general. The defensive commander, left with little choice, led his troops out of the city gates to combat the invaders. This bold move bolstered their spirits, and they momentarily managed to stave off the offensive.
